page.title: 11EDUCATION,LICKEY/CATSHILL
page.content: {Playgroups. Playgroups are for children aged between 3 and 5 years.There are four in our area: Marlbrook,Lickey, Catshill and Cofton Hackett. Some mums help weekly at playgroup, and enjoy it but say it's exhausting. Each mother pays a fee for their child each term. The mums think the main benefit of sending their children to playgroup is to learn to share and mix with other children of their own age.The children enjoy playgroup a lot. Each playgroup has one leader. The children sing songs, make and play with things which will satisfy them for hours. {Schools.} There is a school for the blind attended by 76 pupils aged 5 to 16. The school helps the blind to do activities which are usually only
